[iron_ingot]教程[iron_ingot]

先创建记分板
/scoreboard objectives add naw dummy
/scoreboard players set @p naw 0
give指令：
/give @p[score_naw=0] stone_sword 1 0 {display:{Name:"新手石剑",Lore:["攻击僵尸的武器"]}}复制代码/give @p[score_naw=0] stone_axe 1 0 {display:{Name:"新手石斧",Lore:["一般般的石斧"]}}复制代码/give @p[score_naw=0] stone_pickaxe 1 0 {display:{Name:"新手石镐",Lore:["一般般的石镐]}}复制代码<blockquote>/give @p[score_naw=0] stone_shoevl 1 0 {display:{Name:"新手石铲",Lore:["一般般的石铲"]}}复制代码讲解：
给记分板naw最大为0的玩家物品
最后~~~/scoreboard players set @p naw 1复制代码/tellraw @p[score_naw_min=1] {text:"只能领取一次新手奖励",color=red}复制代码讲解：
把玩家的naw调成1
如果玩家naw记分板为1或以上就说这句话

END
